fpond_sin2.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ==================================================================
00003 !
00004 !                        PONDEROMOTIVE FORCE
00005 !
00006 !  Compute relativistic fpond for standing wave field
00007 !
00008 ! ==================================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine fpond(t,tpulse,sigma0,vosc,omega,xd,yd,zd,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipon)
00011 
00012 
00013   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00014   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration
00015   real, intent(in) :: vosc ! quiver strength
00016   real, intent(in) :: sigma0 ! pulse width (1/e)
00017   real, intent(in) :: omega ! laser frequency
00018   real, intent(in) :: xd,yd,zd ! position to evaluate force; xd is away from target
00019 
00020   real, intent(out) :: phipon, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z ! pond. potential and fields
00021 
00022   real :: xf, yf, zf, Tpon, Rpon, Xpon, Ypon, Zpon, gamma, sigma, atten
00023 
00024   !  linear rise
00025   Tpon = 2*vosc**2*min(1.,t/tpulse) * (sin(omega*t))**2
00026 
00027   sigma = sigma0*sqrt(1.+abs(xd)**2/4./sigma0**2) ! take Rayleigh length 2*sigma0
00028 
00029 !  Rpon = exp((-yd**2-zd**2)/sigma**2)  ! Gaussian
00030   
00031 
00032   !  Standing wave in vacuum; evanescent in overdense plasma
00033   if (xd.ge.0) then
00034      xf = sin(2*omega*xd)
00035      Xpon = cos(omega*xd)**2
00036   else
00037      xf = -2*exp(2*xd)
00038      Xpon = exp(2*xd)
00039   endif
00040 
00041   if (abs(yd)<2*sigma) then
00042      yf = sin(pi*yd/2./sigma)
00043      Ypon = cos(pi*yd/4./sigma)**2
00044   else
00045      yf = 0.
00046      Ypon = 0.
00047   endif
00048 
00049   if (abs(zd)<2*sigma) then
00050      zf = sin(pi*zd/2./sigma)
00051      Zpon = cos(pi*yd/4./sigma)**2
00052   else
00053      zf = 0.
00054      Zpon = 0.
00055   endif
00056 
00057   atten = sigma0**2/sigma**2
00058   phipon = Tpon*Xpon*Ypon*Zpon*atten  ! include attenuation factor
00059 
00060   gamma = sqrt(1.+abs(phipon)/2.)
00061 
00062   Epon_x = Tpon*Ypon*Zpon/4/gamma*xf*atten
00063   Epon_y = Tpon*Xpon/16./gamma*yf
00064   Epon_z = Tpon*Xpon/16./gamma*zf
00065 
00066 
00067 end subroutine fpond
